title: Container unable to start due to django.core.exception
body:
How to reproduce the behaviour
---------
When deploying Doccano to an Azure Web App through the azuredeploy script, the deployment is successful but the container is unable to start due to a django configuration error.

2021-02-24T02:00:04.252746335Z Making staticfiles
2021-02-24T02:00:04.289508141Z Initializing database
2021-02-24T02:00:08.807670869Z Traceback (most recent call last):
2021-02-24T02:00:08.807699170Z   File "manage.py", line 15, in <module>
2021-02-24T02:00:08.807704870Z     execute_from_command_line(sys.argv)
2021-02-24T02:00:08.807709070Z   File "/usr/local/lib/python3.8/site-packages/django/core/management/__init__.py", line 401, in execute_from_command_line
2021-02-24T02:00:08.807715070Z     utility.execute()
2021-02-24T02:00:08.807718971Z   File "/usr/local/lib/python3.8/site-packages/django/core/management/__init__.py", line 395, in execute
2021-02-24T02:00:08.807723371Z     self.fetch_command(subcommand).run_from_argv(self.argv)
2021-02-24T02:00:08.807727271Z   File "/usr/local/lib/python3.8/site-packages/django/core/management/base.py", line 330, in run_from_argv
2021-02-24T02:00:08.807731771Z     self.execute(*args, **cmd_options)
2021-02-24T02:00:08.807735671Z   File "/usr/local/lib/python3.8/site-packages/django/core/management/base.py", line 371, in execute
2021-02-24T02:00:08.807739771Z     output = self.handle(*args, **options)
2021-02-24T02:00:08.807743572Z   File "/doccano/app/api/management/commands/wait_for_db.py", line 22, in handle
2021-02-24T02:00:08.807747572Z     connection.ensure_connection()
2021-02-24T02:00:08.807751472Z   File "/usr/local/lib/python3.8/site-packages/django/utils/asyncio.py", line 26, in inner
2021-02-24T02:00:08.807755772Z     return func(*args, **kwargs)
2021-02-24T02:00:08.807759572Z   File "/usr/local/lib/python3.8/site-packages/django/db/backends/base/base.py", line 219, in ensure_connection
2021-02-24T02:00:08.807763772Z     self.connect()
2021-02-24T02:00:08.807767672Z   File "/usr/local/lib/python3.8/site-packages/django/utils/asyncio.py", line 26, in inner
2021-02-24T02:00:08.807771673Z     return func(*args, **kwargs)
2021-02-24T02:00:08.807775673Z   File "/usr/local/lib/python3.8/site-packages/django/db/backends/base/base.py", line 199, in connect
2021-02-24T02:00:08.807779673Z     conn_params = self.get_connection_params()
2021-02-24T02:00:08.807783473Z   File "/usr/local/lib/python3.8/site-packages/django/db/backends/postgresql/base.py", line 157, in get_connection_params
2021-02-24T02:00:08.807787673Z     raise ImproperlyConfigured(
2021-02-24T02:00:08.807791473Z django.core.exceptions.ImproperlyConfigured: settings.DATABASES is improperly configured. Please supply the NAME value.

Your Environment
---------
<!-- Include details of your environment.-->
Deployed through the one click azure deployment button https://camo.githubusercontent.com/72bcd8efbce44223148091cf74c3e6a37d3935f664f713bc53d312aa0d77d8e9/68747470733a2f2f617a7572656465706c6f792e6e65742f6465706c6f79627574746f6e2e737667
